definition: Baal-Berith, a special deity of the Shechemites

translations.da: Baal-Berith, en særlig guddom for shekemitterne
translations.de: Baal-Berith, eine besondere Gottheit der Sichemiten
translations.es: Baal-Berith, una deidad especial de los Siquemitas
translations.ja: バアル＝ベリス、シェケミ人の特別な神
translations.nb: Baal-Berith, en spesiell guddom for sikemittene
translations.nl: Baäl-Berith, een speciale godheid van de Sichemieten
translations.pt: Baal-Berith, uma divindade especial dos Siquémitas
translations.ro: Baal-Berith, o zeitate specială a shechemiților
translations.sv: Baal-Berith, en speciell gud hos shekemiterna
